sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion'; import { FaUserMd, FaCut, FaHandHoldingMedical, FaHeartbeat, FaBrain, FaBug, FaRunning, FaWater, FaExclamationTriangle, FaGraduationCap, FaHammer, FaFirstAid, FaSoap, FaShoePrints, FaHandsHelping, FaChevronDown, FaChevronUp, FaClock, FaCheckCircle } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Services = () => { const [expandedCard, setExpandedCard] = useState(null); const services = [ { icon: , title: "Diabetic Foot Assessment", description: "Comprehensive evaluation of foot health for diabetic patients, including circulation and sensation testing to prevent complications.", duration: "45-60 minutes", price: "$85", category: "Assessment", benefits: [ "Early detection of diabetic complications", "Circulation and sensation testing", "Personalized care plan", "Prevention of serious foot problems" ], process: "Our comprehensive assessment includes visual inspection, circulation tests, sensation evaluation, and risk assessment to create a personalized foot care plan." }, { icon: , title: "Toenail Cutting & Trimming", description: "Professional nail care service including proper cutting, shaping, and maintenance for healthy nail growth.", duration: "30 minutes", price: "$45", category: "Nail Care", benefits: [ "Proper nail cutting technique", "Prevention of ingrown nails", "Improved nail health", "Safe and hygienic procedure" ], process: "Using professional tools and techniques, we carefully trim and shape your nails to promote healthy growth and prevent complications." }, { icon: , title: "Corn/Callus Removal & Debridement", description: "Safe removal of corns and calluses using professional techniques to relieve pain and prevent recurrence.", duration: "30-45 minutes", price: "$65", category: "Treatment", benefits: [ "Immediate pain relief", "Professional debridement", "Prevention of recurrence", "Improved foot comfort" ], process: "We use specialized instruments to safely remove hardened skin, followed by smoothing and moisturizing to restore healthy skin texture." }, { icon: , title: "Peripheral Circulation & Sensation Assessment", description: "Evaluation of blood flow and nerve function in feet to detect early signs of circulation problems.", duration: "30 minutes", price: "$55", category: "Assessment", benefits: [ "Early detection of circulation issues", "Nerve function evaluation", "Risk assessment", "Preventive care recommendations" ], process: "Using specialized testing equipment, we assess blood flow, pulse strength, and nerve sensitivity to identify potential circulation problems." }, { icon: , title: "Peripheral Neuropathy Assessment", description: "Specialized testing to detect nerve damage in feet, particularly important for diabetic patients.", duration: "30-45 minutes", price: "$70", category: "Assessment", benefits: [ "Early neuropathy detection", "Comprehensive nerve testing", "Risk stratification", "Treatment recommendations" ], process: "We perform detailed nerve function tests using monofilaments, tuning forks, and other specialized tools to assess nerve health." }, { icon: , title: "Fungal Nail Care", description: "Treatment and management of fungal nail infections with professional care and prevention strategies.", duration: "30-45 minutes", price: "$60", category: "Treatment", benefits: [ "Professional fungal treatment", "Nail debridement", "Prevention education", "Ongoing management plan" ], process: "We carefully debride infected nail tissue, apply antifungal treatments, and provide comprehensive education on prevention and care." }, { icon: , title: "Athlete's Foot Treatment", description: "Effective treatment for athlete's foot fungal infections with education on prevention and care.", duration: "30 minutes", price: "$50", category: "Treatment", benefits: [ "Effective fungal treatment", "Symptom relief", "Prevention strategies", "Hygiene education" ], process: "We provide targeted treatment for fungal infections, including topical applications and comprehensive education on prevention." }, { icon: , title: "Dry Skin & Fissure Treatment", description: "Treatment for dry, cracked skin and heel fissures to restore skin health and prevent infection.", duration: "30-45 minutes", price: "$55", category: "Treatment", benefits: [ "Skin restoration", "Fissure healing", "Infection prevention", "Moisturizing treatment" ], process: "We carefully debride dry skin, treat fissures, and apply therapeutic moisturizers to restore healthy skin barrier function." } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
Our Services Comprehensive foot care services designed to keep your feet healthy, comfortable, and pain-free
{/* Services Grid */}
{services.map((service, index) => (
{service.icon}

{service.title}

{service.description}

Duration: {service.duration} Book Now
))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Schedule Your Appointment?

Our experienced team is here to provide you with the best foot care services in Calgary.

Book Appointment Call 403-903-4293
); }; export default Services;
